ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep, I m using obsidian shard and dragoon dirk. OS is I think 6/23 with a 30 dd proc DD is 6/21?  with bonuses to dex, MR The a runed bone fork in ranged slot,
ygData.messageBody:
Yep, I'm using obsidian shard and dragoon dirk.

OS is I think 6/23 with a 30 dd proc
DD is 6/21? with bonuses to dex, MR
The a runed bone fork in ranged slot, I think that's piercing also, but like
9/38, so it just stays in ranged slot.

And yes, weapon delays of low 20s, with an enchanter speedup, we're blinding
fast :)

Bien - Karana

> From: "Robert Maze" <rmaze@...>
>
> You say you are using two piercing weapons at level 36. I am assuming
> that
> one of them is the dirk. What is the other? I had let my pierce skill
> slack quite a bit, so I got out my dirk and a FS dagger. That was the
> first
> time I had used two piercers at one time. With the quickness spell from
> an
> enchanter friend of mine, I was a quisinart. Also I liked the rogue look
> that it gave me. Especially with the Mask of Deception on.
>
> Kurik Nitesong
> 35th bard Veeshan
> "Only the Brave"
> ___________________
> Robert Maze
>
> robert@...
> www.fncinc.com
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Lonnie Lewis [mailto:llewis@...]
> Sent: Friday, March 24, 2000 10:52 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
>
>
> From: Lonnie Lewis <llewis@...>
>
> Like someone else just said, you really can't use a 2h slash.
> Personally, at 17, I was using 2 piercing weapons. Eventually I moved
> to
> 2
> slashing weapons. And now at 36, I'm back to 2 piercing weapons :)
>
> Basically, once you hit 17, you'll be dual wielding the rest of
> your
> life. I don't know any bard that uses a shield (though it is possible)
>
> Don't forget your 1h blunt also. Mine is only about 120 now,
> instead of 185 where all my others are. It's just that to me, no 1h
> blunt
> weapons are really that good, so I haven't really botherd with it much.
>
>
>
>
